aka: The Two People in the Wall
trans_title: The Two People in the Wall
introduction: SYNOPSISChu Myung-ho is a worker in a chemical factory in a small town in North Korea. He gets involved with a female worker and gets her pregnant. When she dies while trying to have an abortion, Chu goes crazy and rapes and strangles a female soldier. He rescues a young worker from being beaten for sleeping on the job and tries to incite his fellow workers. But his attempt at a riot fails and many workers are killed. Escaping death narrowly, Myung-ho makes a run for South Korea. But he is shot to death before he can run to freedom.故事Chok Myeong Ho是北韩的一个化学植物园，深深爱上了公园，怀孕三个月后，她成为流产手术的受害者。震惊的Kwon Myung Ho强奸和扼杀了一名女战士，并拯救了被打死的年轻公园，因为她在工作时正在睡觉，煽动公园。但骚乱失败，许多公园遇害。由于他的大二生活，金正在寻找自由，但最终他被枪杀。
